post.body: what financial crisis? Oh yeah. It is a great 2009 for real!
the book will be Tought Times Never Last, Tough People Do. Why? It renders all complains to dust. Show how strong we are.
yes true. It could be great w.prosperity or not. It is great and it is a good idea but it's not about that. Integrity, honour
check you tomorrow then. Aye, check the article, will bring back memories dude.
Ott I realise there is no such thing as too positive or negative. Rather, one has grown and sees a different perspective of life.
thank you. I also like your comments and articles. Especially your comments on betternetworker.com. Got amazing value.
Right, gonna make a cuppa before I get some work done!
Timeless Business Wisdom http://tinyurl.com/72d37g
Here's the link http://www.xmarkjenkinsx.com/outside.html
Check this out. They call it Street Installations (Art). Look at photo 19. I got to get one and do that somewhere in city centre.
Who else had a computer called Commodore 64? Or remember ZX81? They bring back memories like this one http://duckylink.com/?51bef6a
Good morning everyone! It is, well, not much, but snowing in sheffield, uk.
"If nothing changed, there'd be no butterflies" http://tinyurl.com/7sad5h
....that's how it is with positive and negative, with challenges. They're not too big or negative but rather, when we grow, they seen small
Once I saw a school, teachers, seemed big. I went back, school was seemed to have shrunk, tutors same height. I realised I'd grown.....
One thing got me today. How come we all come from same place and yet, we can't say hello, smile at each other?
For until you are free from limitations and you live within the realm that you are already successful, it will forever hide from you.
For whatever you desire, let it be that you detache from it and show you are in command. It will welcome u with open arms.
“Without trust, words become the hollow sound of a wooden gong. With trust, words become life itself.”
What is trust? It may a year s to build but can be lost in a second. Never lose sight that trust is a powerful word. More powerful than SEO
